translation: I am the Self, O Gudakesa, seated in the hearts of all beings; I am the beginning, the middle, and the end of all beings.
commentary: 10.20 I I? Soul the Self? Gudakesh O Gudakesa? seated in the hearts of all beings? I'm I? Adiá¸¥ the beginning? f and? middle the middle? f and? of (all) beings? Inside the end? Eve even? f and.Commentary O Gudakesa I am the soul (Pratyagatma) which exists in the hearts of all beings and I am also the source or origin? the middle or stay? and the end of all created beings.
